name: 2022 10th International Conference on Social Science and Humanity
content: Publication Information: Journal Publication Accepted and registered papers of ICSSH 2022 will be published in the following journals: International Journal of Social Science and Humanity (IJSSH) Indexing:Google Scholar, Engineering & Technology Digital Library, Crossref, Index Copernicus, and ProQuest ISSN: 2010-3646, DOI: 10.18178/IJSSH Frequency: Quarterly Special Issue: After the author expands the content of the original paper, authors can choose to publish thier papers that meet the topics of JMTI journal in the special issue.
